text:
#COVID19 deaths are continuing to rise. While a #vaccine is around the corner, the immediate threat still lingers in my mind, as I'm sure it does in the minds of others.

I’m reminding you, and myself, that He, #God is still in control. 

Read here: https://t.co/g54OQ4VxcA https://t.co/urlLBVTZSj
